Kim Yong Nam Meets Chinese Ambassador
   Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Wu Donghe who paid a farewell call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.
 On hand were Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kim Yong Il and officials concerned.

Brazilian Youth Delegation Here
   Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the October 8 Revolutionary Youth of Brazil headed by its National Coordinator Marcio Cabreira arrived here on Friday.
